title: OpenCNPJ API
subtitle: Complete documentation of the public API for querying Brazilian business data. Free, fast and no authentication required.
queryCompanyDesc: Returns complete information about a Brazilian company through its CNPJ.
cnpjParamDesc: Company CNPJ (with or without formatting). Must contain 14 digits.
cnpjNotExists: CNPJ does not exist or is not active
bestPractice1: Always validate CNPJ format before making requests
bestPractice2: Implement local cache to avoid unnecessary requests
bestPractice3: Use rate limiting in your application (max. 50 req/s)
bestPractice5: Monitor API status in case of unavailability
avoid1: Don't make requests in uncontrolled loops without rate limiting
avoid2: Don't ignore returned HTTP status codes
avoid3: Don't store sensitive data in logs or public cache
avoid4: Don't use the API for massive data scraping
limitation1: Rate limit: 50 requests per second per IP
limitation4: Data updated monthly by the Federal Revenue
term1: Free API for personal and commercial use
term2: Prohibited use for spam or malicious activities
term4: We reserve the right to limit access in case of abuse
term5: We are not responsible for decisions made based on the provided data
term6: Using the API implies acceptance of these terms
supportMessage: Need help? Our community is here to support you!
databaseDesc: Our database is updated monthly with official information from the Brazilian Federal Revenue.
